## CLIMOD2 Dataset for Cornell University Station

```{r}
climod.df <- read.csv("IthacaWeatherData1990_2020.csv", h=TRUE)

?rollmean()
climod.df$rollmean11 <- rollmean(climod.df$MaxTemp, 19, fill = NA)
rollapply(climod.df$MaxTemp, 3, function(x) mean(x))

```
